title: Planner: New Microsoft Planner app for the web
description: We apologize for any inconvenience; this roadmap item should have included GCC as was communicated in the associated Message center post. The new Microsoft Planner app for the web is a single, unified work management experience. Assisted by AI, it brings together the simplicity of Microsoft To Do, the collaboration of Planner, and the power of Microsoft Project into a simple, scalable, intelligent solution that spans from individual task management to enterprise and professional project management.
